sentences.sContent: You then can a multi-group either diffusion equation or solve these types of equations and more rigorously.
sentences.sContent_eng: You then can a multi-group either diffusion equation or solve these types of equations and more rigorously.
sentences.sCn: 然后你有一个多群的或者是扩散等式,或者更严厉地解决这些等式。

sentences.sContent: As we discuss in the next section, this lack of trust directs the group toward rigorously detailed contracts and specifications.
sentences.sContent_eng: As we discuss in the next section, this lack of trust directs the group toward rigorously detailed contracts and specifications.
sentences.sCn: 正如我们下一节的讨论，这种缺乏信任将导致组织严酷地细化合同和规格。

sentences.sContent: At a high level, we apply authentication and authorization rigorously.
sentences.sContent_eng: At a high level, we apply authentication and authorization rigorously.
sentences.sCn: 在高级别上，我们严格应用身份验证和授权。

words.tran: 严格的，严厉的；严密的；严酷的
严格地；坚硬地；严厉地；牢牢地
